channel.title: Webclient Help
channel.description: i made a webclient i jarred it and everything and it downloads the cache correctly but after it downloads that this happens [img]http://i.imgur.com/8DJNW.png[/img] also when i compile the client this shows up [code]CacheDownloader.java:40: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawLoadingText(int,java.lang.String) location: class client client.drawLoadingText(35, text); ^ CacheDownloader.java:46: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawLoadingText(int,java.lang.String) location: class client client.drawLoadingText(amount, text); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

search for it in where?

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Try searching for

SPRITES/

Client Sided and change it to your C:/ drive location

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

Get Blitz:

Go into your client and look at the current cache dir and change it to your new one Ex. “C:/MYCOMPUTER/RSPS/SPRITES/”

how do i look at the cache dir . will that fixz the connection error?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Go into your client and look at the current cache dir and change it to your new one Ex. “C:/MYCOMPUTER/RSPS/SPRITES/”

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

imsuperman05:

Rewrite them to load from the C: drive, or signlink.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

so what do i do?

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Some of the sprites are being loaded from the cache in the client, you have to rewrite them to load from the C: drive, or signlink.

Read full topic

item.description:

also when i compile the client this shows up CacheDownloader.java:40: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawLoadingText(int,java.lang.String) location: class client client.drawLoadingText(35, text); ^ CacheDownloader.java:46: cannot find symbol symbol : method drawLoadingText(int,java.lang.String) location: class client client.drawLoadingText(amount, text); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
